sect2.title: Images
sect2.para: The Images plugin generates MapServer images. The three types of images are main map, key map and scale bar. Basic parameters, such as image size, are defined in this request/result. More specific parameters, such as map location or content, are defined in other plugins.

para.programlisting: <complexType name="Image"> <all> <element name="isDrawn" type="xsd:boolean"/> <element name="path" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="width" type="xsd:int"/> <element name="height" type="xsd:int"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: isDrawn - true if the image should be generated (when used in a request) or if it was generated (when returned in a result)
path - relative path of generated image. Not used in request

para.programlisting: <complexType name="ImagesRequest"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="mainmap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="keymap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="scalebar" type="types:Image"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: className - "ImagesRequest" or extended class name if project implements an extension

para.programlisting: <complexType name="ImagesResult"> <all> <element name="className" type="xsd:string"/> <element name="mainmap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="keymap" type="types:Image"/> <element name="scalebar" type="types:Image"/> </all> </complexType>

listitem.para: className - "ImagesResult" or extended class name if project implements an extension
mainmap - main map image information (see for a description of type Image)
